name: dropper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small tube with a rubber container at one end that is filled with air and allows liquid to be given out in separate drops

Add to word list
Add to word list
a small tube with a rubber container at one end which is pressed and released to draw a liquid into the tube, and which can then be lightly pressed to release very small amounts of the liquid
